Synonyms.Synonym: Doppler ultrasound of the heart - children

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Echocardiogram - children
QAPair.Answer: An echocardiogram is a test that uses sound waves to create pictures of the heart. It is used with children to help diagnose defects of the heart that are present at birth (congenital). The picture is more detailed than a regular x-ray image. An echocardiogram also does not expose children to radiation.
